title: Requirements
body: VS Code 1.60+ (or a compatible IDE), an OpenAI API key, and internet connectivity are required to use the Codex extension.

title: Installation
body: Open the extensions panel in VS Code, search for OpenAI Codex, click Install, and Reload if prompted. Alternatively, use the command line to install the extension.

title: Authentication
body: After installation, run Codex: Sign in from the Command Palette and paste your API key when prompted.

title: Next steps
body: Trigger inline completions by typing or pressing Ctrl+Space, open the Codex panel to view suggestions, and visit the IDE usage guide for advanced tips.
